component.name: peb
component.summary: HTML interface for Perl 5 desktop applications

description.p: Perl Executing Browser (PEB) is an HTML5 user interface for Perl 5 desktop applications. By default it runs local Perl 5 scripts as child processes with no server and is implemented as a C++ executable based on the Qt 5 libraries. Inspired by Electron and NW.js, PEB is another reuse of web technologies in desktop applications with Perl doing the heavy lifting instead of Node.js.
